metadata.title: CVE-2023-5727 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The executable file warning was not presented when downloading .msix,.msixbundle, .appx, and .appxbundle files, which can run commands on auser's computer. *Note: This issue only affected Windows operating systems.Other operating systems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox< 119, Firefox ESR < 115.4, and Thunderbird < 115.4.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
